mapper.select: SELECT ID, MAIL_ADDRESS, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, REGIST_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETED FROM t_users WHERE DELETED = 0 ORDER BY ID
SELECT ID, MAIL_ADDRESS, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, REGIST_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETED FROM t_users WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_users ( MAIL_ADDRESS, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, REGIST_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETED ) VALUES ( #{user.mailAddress}, #{user.userName}, SHA2(#{user.password}, 256), NULL, #{user.registTime}, #{user.updateTime}, 0 )
